definition: to support/to sustain/to erect/to raise/branch/division/to draw money/classifier for rods such as pens and guns, for army divisions and for songs or compositions
to hold/to grasp/to support/to maintain/to persevere/to manage/to run (i.e. administer)/to control

sentences.english: A majority party nominee usually has the advantage of support over a minority party one. A major-party nominee always gets higher approval rating than a minor-party nominee.
sentences.chinese: 多数党被提名者得到的支持率往往高出少数党候选人。

sentences.english: S. public opinion survey public-opinion surveys show the decillion supports declining support for the war in Afghanistan.
sentences.chinese: 美国民意调查表明对于阿富汗战争的支持率下滑。

sentences.english: Why are we using different wordings to measure the support rates of CE and the principal officials?
sentences.chinese: 为什么特首和问责官员的支持率采用不同提问方式？

sentences.english: He should know; his approval rating has dipped below 30%.
sentences.chinese: 他对此应该有所体会，他的支持率已经跌破了30%。

sentences.english: U. S. public-opinion surveys show declining support for the war in Afghanistan.
sentences.chinese: 美国的民意调查显示对阿富汗战争的支持率正在下滑。

sentences.english: With 90% of the vote counted, the governing African National Congress is heading for a decisive victory.
sentences.chinese: 国民大会党以90%的投票支持率取得决定性的胜利。

sentences.english: Usually a major-party nominee has a higher approval rating than a minor-party nominee.
sentences.chinese: 多数党被提名者得到的支持率往往高出少数党候选人。

sentences.english: By the time he signed legislation averting a federal default, he was mired in the low-40% range.
sentences.chinese: 到他签署避免政府违约的法案时，支持率仅为40%。

sentences.english: A major party nominee usually gets higher approval rating than a minor-party nominee.
sentences.chinese: 多数党被提名者得到的支持率往往高出少数党候选人。

sentences.english: A major-party nominee usually has the advantage of support over a minor-party candidate.
sentences.chinese: 多数党被提名者得到的支持率往往高出少数党候选人。

sentences.english: Has led most national polls but is behind in early primary voting states.
sentences.chinese: 在民意测验中一路领先，但在初选州的支持率下降。

sentences.english: Piniella is more conducive to increased support for the implementation of the New Deal.
sentences.chinese: 支持率上升更有利于皮涅拉推行新政。

sentences.english: Support for hydrogen power was 32%, down from 36% in 2007.
sentences.chinese: 同样，氢能的支持率从36%降至32%。

sentences.english: The approval rating for Congress dropped to 9% in one recent poll.
sentences.chinese: 国会的支持率在最近一次的民意调查中降至9%。

definition: (Tw) Emmanuel Macron (1977-), president of France from 2017
the state of play in an election/the current state of a candidate's campaign
